name: Barotrauma (itch)
description:
A game made by JayPEG, whose member's are:

Jonathan Jay, Matthew North, Matthew McPherson,  Jonathan Leung,  Léo Buono, Ryan Chang

Made as a first year game project using Box2D as the physics engine.

Credits to things we did not create that are used in the game in reference.txt.

Game has keyboard and controller support, Controls:

Shown in game! but here's some exra/not obvious ones:

D or Start to dismiss the pop-ups.

F11 to get out of fullscreen if it bothers you.

Esc or Select quit to main menu when in game.

There is no pausing.
